arguments.content:
Remote Work Amendment 2024‑01

Effective Date: 2024-06-01

Article 3‑1

Employers must provide at least one day per week of remote work for all eligible employees.

Article 4‑2

Managers must obtain written consent from employees before assigning remote‑work days.

arguments.title: Regulatory Update – Remote Work Amendment 2024‑01
arguments.body:
## Impact Summary

- **Mandatory remote‑work day**: Employers must provide at least one day per week of remote work for eligible employees (Art.3‑1).
- **Manager consent**: Written consent is required before assigning remote‑work days (Art.4‑2).

**Recommended Action**: Add a new section to the Employee Handbook to mandate the weekly remote‑work day and update the consent procedure accordingly.

*Effective Date: 2024‑06‑01*
